title: Solving Exp and Logs - extraneous solutions

content.question: ​The function <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 2 x plus log subscript 2 open parentheses x minus 2 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What are all values of <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x equals negative 2"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals negative 1"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
